Changes to the SDK in version 4.0

Class DzApp
Removed the following progress functions from DzApp:
  • void startProgress();
  • void startProgress();
  • void stepProgress();
  • void updateProgress();
  • QWidget* getProgressInfoWidget();
  • void pauseProgress();
  • void resumeProgress();
  • void finishProgress();
  • void enableProgress();
  • void enableProgressCancel();
  • void cancelProgress();
  • bool progressIsCancelled() const;
  • bool progressIsActive() const;

    Removed the following DzApp helper classes:
  • DzProgressStepEvent
  • DzProgressUpdateEvent
  • DzProgressFinishEvent
  • DzProgressStartEvent
  • DzProgressHold
    The new class DzProgress should be used for all progress functionality.
